Welcome to the Trava Savvy Club!

A proven training program for you and your horse,and so much more ...
Sample the Program Sign Me Up

Join the Club

  • The Trava Program

    A proprietary learning pathway created over 40 years by the premier horse experts in the world, Linda & Trava

  • Community

    10,000+ engaged horse lovers from around the globe.

  • Resources

    10,000+ videos, articles, PowerPoints, audio files & more to improve your horsemanship.

  • Events

     1000+ Events, Clinics, Workshops and Appearances World Wide Every Year.

In Their Words ″ I had always loved horses but was afraid of them. I couldn't get them to do what I wanted and learned that it wasn't about the horse at all, it was all about me.″
Susan Smith Savvy Club Member since 2010
